assignments.description: set the variable to true if the Gender is incorrect
assignments.name: setIncorrectValueGender
assignments.label: setIncorrectValueGender

decisions.description: Case00001908: Check if the School is Beau Soleil, only Summer Camp opportunities should be pushed
decisions.name: checkSummerCamp
decisions.label: checkSummerCamp

fields.name: txtBlankGender
fields.fieldText: One or more of the Child are missing a Gender. Please update this and re-push the record.

fields.name: IncorrectValueText
fields.fieldText: One or more Child have an incorrect Gender value. Please update this to "Male" or "Female" and re-push the record.

fields.name: txtErrMidTier
fields.fieldText: This Opportunity has already been allocated an ID from a different iSAMS, please raise a case within Salesforce and this will be amended.

fields.name: txtErrMidTier_0
fields.fieldText: One or more of your Contact/s have already been allocated an ID from a different iSAMS, please raise a case within Salesforce and this will be amended.﻿

fields.name: txtSchoolUnavailable_0
fields.fieldText: There is no School of Interest related to the Account.

fields.name: txtDisplError
fields.fieldText: The School of Interest on the Account does not match the School of Interest on the Opportunity. Please update the Account to match the Opportunity.

fields.name: txtDisplError_0
fields.fieldText: Please ensure that the Opportunity has a School of Interest and try again.

fields.name: txtDisplError_0_0
fields.fieldText: One or more of your Contact/s do not have the same School Of Interest as your Account. Please update and try again.

fields.name: txtDisplError_0_0_0
fields.fieldText: Please ensure that the Contact/s related to the Account has a School of Interest and try again.
